for more information
[Music]
beginning development in the wake of the
New Republic's conquest of Khorasan the
nebula class Star Destroyer was designed
to serve as the figurehead of the
so-called new fleet modernization
program a long-planned range of advanced
warship designs that saw numerous
production delays as a result of the
Thrawn campaign and the reborn conflict
finally completed in 15 ABY the nebula
class represented a major point of
transition for the new republic stepping
away from the ramshackle fleets of mixed
background warships that had defined the
Rebel Alliance and laying the groundwork
for a uniform and distinctive Republic
Navy at a length of 1040 meters the
nebula class is in fact smaller than the
mainline warships of the Fallen Galactic
Empire presenting a narrow and efficient
profile that focuses on tactical
adaptability rather than intimidation
the nebulas frame is designed to improve
upon numerous clear vulnerabilities seen
in the warships of the galactic empire
choosing to employ concealed command
decks and communications arrays buried
beneath the whole as well as positioning
weapons hard points to provide full
hemispheres of targeting coverage the
nebula class is armed with 40 heavy
turbo laser batteries as well as an
additional 40 standard turbo lasers 20
ion cannons and eight turreted
autoloading concussion missile launchers
the vessel carries no point defense
weaponry but does offer some of the most
powerful deflector shielding ever
deployed in combat allowing the vessel
to resist concentrated fire from
numerous opponents and even to enjoy the
firepower of star dreadnought grade
vessels for a short time the nebula
carries an impressive airwing of 60
strike craft most often comprised of a
weighing superiority fighters k weighing
strategic bombers and income defender
patrol fighters as well as a
supplementary supply of older x wing and
a wing units with 60 ships embarked the
nebula boasted a similar sized strike
wing to an imperial 2 class Star
Destroyer but composed of fighters and
bombers that were far deadlier on an
individual basis than any craft from the
Cynar ty series the nebula class carries
a crew of six thousand 795 with space
for an embarked complement of 1600
assault troopers this allowed the nebula
to serve as a rapid relief craft for New
Republic border outposts or to launch
highly effective boarding actions when
engaged in ship-to-ship combat even
threatening the security compliments of
many vessels twice its size the nebula
class is incredibly agile for a capital
grade warship able to continually
reposition to protect damaged areas
while maintaining constant attacks even
during evasive action as a result of its
360 degree turbo laser coverage
unlike the Star Destroyers of yesteryear
the nebula class was a warship designed
to be employed tactically able to
maintain pressure on an opponent's even
when withdrawing and contributing to
highly effective formations and attack
maneuvers in conjunction with friendly
ships as an unfortunate result of its
long production cycle and the political
environments it was released into the
nebula class spent most of its career in
peacetime where very few of the craft
were commissioned to avoid the
appearance of unjú militarism fewer than
50 ships of the class were ever
constructed
but these vessels eventually saw action
late in their service at the outbreak of
the Yuuzhan Vong war numerous reports
indicated that the nebula was one of the
Republic's most effective units in
combat with the Vong but this was not
enough to result in a renewal of the
ship's production cycle this video was
sponsored by Skillshare Skillshare is an
online collaborative learning community
aimed at people working in the creative
industries and content creators like
myself and others interested in
producing the same kind of content it's
a fantastic service filled with tens of
thousands of courses and educational
videos and it covers a far wider range
of topics than you might expect
for instance a particularly on-brand
course for fans of space stock might be
a game artists guide to science fiction
by Adrian de Cambra which you can find
on Skillshare this course extrapolates
on details about 3d textures and
interior designs for space craft and
stations and various other futuristic
environments common to the science
fiction genre it's geared toward 3d
artists but I'd argue that an
understanding of well produced
aesthetics for science fiction
environments is just as important for
novelists screenwriters or anyone else
working on science fiction world
building Skillshare is extremely
affordable costing only $10 a month on
subscription but you can use the code
space stock and the link in the
description to get the first two months
of Skillshare premium for free thanks
again to everyone at Skillshare for
currently supporting Spacedock with this
sponsorship and I really would encourage
you all to check it out in the
description below this is Daniel from
space doc signing off
thank you for watching Spacedock if
you're interested in supporting the
channel please do check out the links on
the screen right now or in the
description below for our patreon and
channel membership services anything you
can pledge goes towards improving our
team and our equipment and allowing us
to put together bigger and more exciting
video projects for you guys on the
